r.d: This is the SQLite MDB2 driver.
r.n:
first unbundled release from MDB2 core
- cosmetic fixes to _getDatabaseFile() - dont just check for isset() for boolean values in order to support setting them false as well (bug #4373) - ensure SQL injection protection in all _quote() methods (was missing in some decimal, float, time, date and timestamp implementations) - check if database_name is empty to determine if to connect in connect() - Warning: there are some serious issues on php5 HEAD on windows
